participant_1.name: George
participant_1.personality: George is a passionate and dedicated individual who enjoys the simple pleasures in life. His work as a bee farmer reflects his nurturing and caring nature.
participant_1.background: i've zero family that i'm close to. my favorite food is papaya. i am a bee farmer. my name is george.

participant_2.name: Sophia
participant_2.personality: Sophia is an energetic and ambitious person with a zest for life. Her dedication to fitness and her love for gymnastics highlight her competitive spirit.
participant_2.background: i love italian food and garlic bread. i workout four hours a day. gymnastics is my favorite sport. i am a gold medalist olympian. my favorite color is yellow.
